content: thumb when worn tip be sure to count your rounds so you know how many rounds to knit for the 2nd mitten k2tog all the way around 7 sts © jacq knits break yarn and with darning needle draw through remaining stitches pull to close push needle through hole to inside turn mitten inside out when weaving in ends take the tail from the start of the thumb and stitch to close up the two gaps at the base of the thumb weave in all other ends © jacq knits
